title: Principles & Practice of Palliative Care
description:
This module aims to provide students with an understanding of the philosophy, principles, goals and development of palliative care. It will also enhance the cognitive, affective and psychomotor abilities of students in the provision of
holistic care to patients and families with life-threatening disease.
department: Alice Lee Center for Nursing Studies
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
